unlock_wallet_to_access_pkey: Unlock your wallet to access your Private Key. After unlocking, it will be displayed for you to copy or write down.
footnote_warning: Make sure to keep your Private Key safe and private at all times. Do not share your Private Key with anyone.
unlock_wallet_title: Unlock your wallet to access your Private Key
tap_on_copy_icon: Tap on the Copy button below to copy your Private Key to the clipboard. Don't paste it to an unsecure place!
key_copied_to_clipboard: Private Key was copied to Clipboard.
